sentences.sContent: These favorable anticipations have been realized.
sentences.sCn: 这些有利的期望已被实现。

sentences.sContent: But it didn't, because of unusually favorable ocean currents and weather patterns.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it didn't, because of unusually favorable ocean currents and weather patterns.
sentences.sCn: 但它因为异常有利的洋流和气候模式因此并没有消失。

sentences.sContent: Optimism is looking at a more favorable side of events and simply anticipating the best possible outcome in any situation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Optimism is looking at a more favorable side of events and simply anticipating the best possible outcome in any situation.
sentences.sCn: 乐观就是看得见事件的更有利的一面并在任何形势下只预期可能得到的最好的结果。

synos.tran: 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的

phrases.pCn: 在有利的情形下；在适宜的条件下

words.tran: 最喜爱的；中意的；宠爱的
有利的；受到优待的；受到喜爱的
顺利地；有利地；好意地（等于favorably）
幸运儿；喜欢的事物；特别喜欢的人
赞成；宠爱；帮助（favor的过去分词）；给…以恩惠
